pages.title: Crested Newt
pages.text: It is a large newt, with females growing up to 16 cm ($(o)6.3 in$()) long.$(br2)Its back and sides are dark brown, while the belly is yellow to orange with dark blotches.$(br2)Males develop a conspicuous jagged crest on their back and tail during the breeding season.

pages.title: Crested Newt
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★★☆☆$(br2)Always active$(br2)2 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: None$(br2)Number of Offspring: 5$(br2)Growth time: 3 Days
